name: SlabTour
description:
SlabTour is a puzzle game featured the "knight's our" in three-dimension!

There are 60 levels in the current release.

In each level, try touring around all the "slabs" by clicking on the ones located at the "L" positions from the starting one.

For more informations about the concept of knight's tour. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Knight's_tour
